mapper.sql: id, pid, name, en_name as enName, content, create_date AS createDate, update_date AS updateDate
mapper.select: select a.id, a.pid, a.name,a.en_name as enName,a.content, a.create_date AS createDate, a.update_date AS updateDate, b.name as parentName, a.pid as `key` from sys_dict a left join sys_dict b on a.pid = b.id where b.name is not null order by a.en_name, a.name

select a.id, a.pid, a.name,a.en_name as enName,a.content, a.create_date AS createDate, a.update_date AS updateDate, b.name as parentName from sys_dict a left join sys_dict b on a.pid = b.id
a.pid = #{pid}
and a.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
order by a.en_name, a.name
